description: A weather-resistant ‘60s-inspired expedition parka in NetPlus® 100% postconsumer recycled nylon made from recycled fishing nets to help reduce ocean plastic pollution; sleeves insulated with 60-g Thermogreen® polyester; body and hood lined with 100% recycled polyester fleece.
name: Patagonia Isthmus Parka - Mens

specs.value: 4.4-oz 100% recycled nylon with a PU coating and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish
2.2-oz 100% recycled polyester taffeta with a HeiQ® Eco Dry PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals)
